## ControlArrayOverrides type

Represents an object of configurable properties on TGroup, allowing form state selectors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ControlArrayOverrides<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object, TArray extends ControlArraySchema<any, any>> = Partial<ControlArrayOverridables<TForm, TInputState, TArray["controlTemplate"], Partial<GetViewOptionsFromControl<TArray>>>>;
```
